divs: Sighting DetailsMy 10 year old daughter took this picture near bearcat stadium in aledo texas on 11-07-08. She said that she watched this bright object slowly moving around for about 10 minutes or so. Then it slowly faded away.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Aledo
